Filipino(fil): Bago bumiyahe, siguraduhing gumagana ang mahahalagang bahagi ng motor para sa iyong kaligtasan. I-check ang B-L-O-W-B-A-G-E-T-S.
English(en): Before driving, make sure the important parts of your vehicle are working properly. Check B-L-O-W-B-A-G-E-T-S.

Filipino(fil): Subukan mong i-start ang iyong motor para makita ang kondisyon ng battery nito.
English(en): Try to start your motorcycle to check the battery’s condition.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Okay pa ang battery mo at nag-start ang iyong motor.
English(en): Nice! Your battery is working and your motorcycle started properly.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Hindi nag-on ang motor mo. Mukhang kailangan mo nang ipatingin ang battery ng iyong motor at ipapalit na ito kung matagal na itong hindi napapalitan.
English(en): Oh no! Your motorcycle didn’t start. You might need to have the battery checked and get it replaced if it hasn't been replaced in a long time.

Filipino(fil): Buksan mo ang front lights ng iyong motor para makita kung ito ay gumaganam
English(en): Turn on your front lights to see if they're working.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Mukhang gumagana ang front lights ng iyong motor.
English(en): Nice! Your front lights seem to be working.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang hindi gumagana ang front lights ng iyong motor. Siguraduhing mapaayos muna ito.
English(en): Oh no! It seems like your front lights are not working. Make sure to have them fixed first.

Filipino(fil): Paandarin ang kahit aling brake para makita kung gumagana ang brake lights mo.
English(en): Hold down any of the brakes to see if the brake lights are working.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Mukhang gumagana ang brake lights ng iyong motor.
English(en): Nice! Your brake lights seem to be working.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang hindi gumagana ang brake lights ng iyong motor. Siguraduhing mapaayos muna ito.
English(en): Oh no! It seems like your brake lights are not working. Make sure to have them fixed first.

Filipino(fil): Buksan mo ang iyong blinker lights para i-check kung ito ay gumagana.
English(en): Turn on your blinker lights to see if they're working.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Gumagana nang maayos ang blinkers mo.
English(en): Nice! Your blinkers are working fine.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Hindi umiilaw ang blinkers mo. Siguraduhing mapaayos muna ito.
English(en): Oh no! Your blinkers aren’t lighting up. Make sure to have them fixed first.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang dip stick ng makina ng iyong motor para makita kung angkop pa ang dami ng langis nito.
English(en): Check the dipstick of your motorcycle's engine to see if your oil level is at the right amount.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Sakto ang level ng langis sa makina ng iyong motor.
English(en): Nice! Your engine oil level is just right.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang nasobrahan o nagkulang ang langis sa loob ng makina ng motor mo. Siguraduhin mo munang tama ang level ng langis.
English(en): Oh no! It seems like your engine oil level is either too much or too little. Make sure it's just right.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang coolant level sa iyong motor para makita kung angkop ang dami nito.
English(en): Check the coolant level of your motorcycle to make sure it's within the recommended amount.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Sakto ang coolant level sa motor mo.
English(en): Nice! Your coolant level is just right.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang nasobrahan o nagkulang ang coolant level ng motor mo. Siguraduhin mong nasa tamang level ang coolant para hindi mag-overheat ang makina mo.
English(en): Oh no! It seems like your coolant level is either too high or too low. Make sure it's just right to prevent your engine from overheating.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang brake fluid levels sa iyong motor para makita kung angkop pa ang dami niyo.
English(en): Check the brake fluid level of your motorcycle to see if there's still enough.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Mukhang gumagana nang maayos ang brakes mo.
English(en): Nice! Your brakes are working well.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Baka magloko ang brakes mo habang bumabyahe ka. Siguraduhing tama ang level ng brake fluid ng motor mo.
English(en): Oh no! Your brakes might not work properly while riding. Make sure the brake fluid is at the right level.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang front tire pressure kung tama lang ang tigas nito.
English(en): Check the front tire pressure to see if it's firm enough.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Tama lang ang front tire pressure mo.
English(en): Nice! The front tire pressure is just right.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Masyadong matigas o malambot ang front tire mo. I-adjust mo ang tire pressure.
English(en): Oh no! Your front tire is either too hard or too soft. Adjust the pressure accordingly.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang rear tire pressure kung tama lang ang tigas nito.
English(en): Check the rear tire pressure to see if it's firm enough.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Tama lang ang rear tire pressure mo.
English(en): Nice! The rear tire pressure is just right.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Masyadong matigas o malambot ang rear tire mo. I-adjust mo ang tire pressure.
English(en): Oh no! Your rear tire is either too hard or too soft. Adjust the pressure accordingly.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo kung may sapat na gas pa ang iyong motor.
English(en): Check if your motorcycle still has enough gas.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Sapat pa ang gas ng iyong motor.
English(en): Nice! Your motorcycle has enough gas.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang mauubusan na ng gas ang motor mo. Magpa-gas ka muna.
English(en): Oh no! Looks like you’re about to run out of gas. Refuel first.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo kung umaandar nang maayos ang iyong makina at walang itong kakaibang tunog.
English(en): Check if your engine runs smoothly and if there are no unusual sounds when started.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Mukhang gumagana nang maayos ang makina mo.
English(en): Nice! Your engine seems to be running smoothly.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang may mali sa makina mo. Siguraduhing mapaayos muna ito.
English(en): Oh no! Something might be wrong with your engine. Make sure to have them fixed first.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang kondisyon ng front tires mo kung pudpod na o mayroon nang hindi pantay na parte.
English(en): Check the front tire’s condition if it is worn out or uneven.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Maganda pa ang itsura ng front tire mo.
English(en): Nice! The front tire still looks good.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang deformed o pudpod na ang front tire mo. Ipapalit mo na ito.
English(en): Oh no! Your front tire looks worn out or deformed. Have it replaced.

Filipino(fil): I-check mo ang kondisyon ng rear tires mo kung pudpod na o mayroon nang hindi pantay na parte.
English(en): Check the rear tire’s condition if it is worn out or uneven.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Maganda pa ang itsura ng rear tire mo.
English(en): Nice! The rear tire still looks good.

Filipino(fil): Hala! Mukhang deformed o pudpod na ang rear tire mo. Ipapalit mo na ito.
English(en): Oh no! Your rear tire looks worn out or deformed. Have it replaced.

Filipino(fil): Maghanda ng sarili gamit ang angkop na kasuotan.
English(en): Get yourself readied with the proper riding gear.

Filipino(fil): Ayos! Mukhang akma ang gamit mong helmet at kasuotan. Pwede ka nang magmaneho. Ingat!
English(en): Nice! Your helmet and gear are all up to standards! You're now ready to drive. Stay safe!

Filipino(fil): Hala! Isa o higit pa sa iyong kasuotan ay hindi angkop! Siguraduhin na ang iyong helmet ay ICC-certified at ang iyong suot sa paa ay close-footed. Mas maganda rin kung gagamit ka ng riding gears gaya ng pads sa siko at tuhod para sa extrang proteksyon.
English(en): Oh no! There are one or more of your gear that isn't up to standards. Make sure your helmet is ICC-certified and your footwear is close-footed. Inclusion of riding gear like elbow and knee pads are a plus for extra protection.
